## Load libraries

```{r}
library(purrr) #used for pmap 

```

## Bring in the function

```{r}
autopower = function( m, V, A, crolling = 0.015, Cdrag = 0.3, g = 9.8, p_air = 1.2) {
  if (V < 0) V = NA
  if (m < 0) return("Mass cannot be less than 0")
  result = (crolling * m * g* V) + (0.5 * A * p_air * Cdrag * V**3)
return(result) }
```
